name: Directa Obscura
text: Before you spend a token from your command sheet, you may exhaust this card to remove one of your tokens form the game board and spend it instead.

name: Non-Euclidean Geometries
text: Your ships are adjacent to nexus tokens. When you retreat, you may exhaust this card to treat your home system as if it contained a nexus token

name: Defensive Architecture
text: After 1 or more hits are produced against your units during space combat, you may exhaust this card to cancel 1 of those hits. If you do, produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

name: Molecular Binding
text: At the start of your turn, you may replace 1 of your fighters on the game board with 1 destroyer from your reinforcements, or 2 infantry on any planet you control with 1 mech from your reinforcements.

name: Cinderborn II
text: When this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 6 or greater, you may produce 1 hit. Then, place this unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

name: Ashfall Engine II
text: This unit may not be destroyed by 'Direct Hit' action cards. When this unit is destroyed or uses its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability, you may use its BOMBARDMENT ability against a planet in its system.

name: Riptide II
text: When this unit is destroyed, place 1 infantry form your reinforcements on its planet. If it was in the space area, place 1 fighter instead. This unit may move without being transported. mechs in excess of capacity count against your fleet limit.

name: Advanced Targeting Systems
text: At the start of ground combat: You may exhaust this card. If you do, only your units roll for the first round of combat.

name: Quantum Restructuring
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to place 1 structure on a planet with a Design attached to it.

name: Resource Optimization
text: At any time, exhaust this card to exhaust a planet you control and ready any other planet you control. If it is a legendary planet, ready it's ability card as well.

name: Data Mining
text: At the start of the status phase, gain 1 trade good for every compromised structure on the game board.

name: Siphon II
text: When using this unit's PRODUCTION ability, discount the combined cost of the units produced by the number of compromised structures on the game board. Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against capacity.
